title: pixel 3xl stopped connecting to BT hearing aid & cochlear implant -can only connect one or the other
content: my Pixel 3xl now will only connect to either my hearing aid oe my cochlear implant - it was working yesterday. I used to be able to stream phone conversations to both ears--now I have to choose one or the other.  This just started today - has been working correctly (both devices connected) sine i got my cochlear implant a year and a half ago.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
